description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/projects/retrieve-a-project/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/projects/retrieve-a-project/)

Return details on an individual project.

### Path Parameters

`organization_slug` *(string)*REQUIRED

The slug of the organization the project belongs to.

`project_slug` *(string)*REQUIRED

The slug of the project to retrieve.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `project:read`
